title: K500 Series Features
description: The K500 Series brewer features an 80 ounce water reservoir, extra large color touch display, programmable clock, an auto brew option,  a strength control setting for brewing bolder coffee and a customizable night light in the water reservoir.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: The K500 Series brewer features an 80 ounce water reservoir, extra large color touch display, programmable clock, an auto brew option,  a strength control setting for brewing bolder coffee and a customizable night light in the water reservoir.

transcripts: Say hello to the next generation of Keurig. The Keurig 2.0 K500 series. Keurig 2.0 is the first Keurig system to brew a cup and a carafe at the touch of a button. Choose a K-cup pack to brew a single cup or a K-carafe pack to brew a four cup carafe. It's so smart, so simple, so Keurig. With Keurig 2.0 brewing technology designed to read each portion pack lid. To brew the perfect beverage every time. The Keurig 2.0 K500 series features a 80-ounce water reservoir, extra large color touch display, 10 brew sizes, strength control, programmable clock, auto off, customizable features to make it your own such as night light and wallpapers and auto brew. Say hello to more than 250+ varieties from 40 brands you know and love. All with the guarantee of Keurig quality. So you always know you're brewing the best. So smart, so simple, so Keurig.
